name: validator-tier2-java-spring
description: [Tier 2 - Technology] Java/Spring specific quality checks. RUN WHEN: Code is Java/Spring. RUN AFTER: Tier 1 passes. CHECKS: Maven/Gradle build, Checkstyle, SpotBugs, OWASP dependency-check.
system_instructions: Run Java/Spring quality checks: build validation, static analysis, dependency vulnerability scan.
